page.title: 11MINING TRAGEDY IN GOLDTHORPE
page.content: On November 11th 1984 at 1.10 pm. a terrible accident happened in Goldthorpe, South Yorkshire. Three boys were picking coal on a railway banking. They had been before with their dad (Mr. Holmes) but they wanted to go on their own with their friends. Mr. Holmes told them not to dig underneath the banking. When suddenly it fell right on them. Jimmy Rawson who was passing by heard the cry, "Help! Help!" He rushed over to them and started digging but the rest of the banking fell on Jimmy, breaking both his legs. Another boy Darren who was with them ran for help to Paul's and Darren's house and shouted for their dad, Mr. Holmes. who didn't believe him at first, but he ran out in his slippers. Digging frantically he tried to get his two sons out. Unfortunately Darren was already dead.
